text:
The ability to retrieve a HSSFSheet object from one HSSFWorkbook and add it to 
another HSSFWorkbook seems like an invaluable feature.
creator: dennis.trask@nielsenmedia.com

text:
Given the nature of bidirectional references, the simplest way to achieve this
would be to copy each cell one at a time. So this would make a nice utility
method, there doesnt seem to any nice internal magic that will make this happen
without  a bit FOR loop !
creator: avik@apache.org
